title: Making clash team + buying tickets (G2-P3)
body:
G’day,

I’m putting together a clash team and will buy tickets for the team with blue essence. Please add me and let me know you preferred positions. League is for fun so no turbo aggros please, we will win and lose so if you can’t keep a smile on your face through both this isn’t the team for you.

Cheers!

replies.body: im a G3 Jungle main. i can play a few junglers pretty well add me if you still need players. https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=dardside101
Plat 4 Jg main 71% wr, pretty aggressive early game playstyle mainly centered on snowballing and closing out games asap, ign: mylittiepwny (hec main xD)
